code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios,{all}from"axios";import{useQuery}from"./useContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TreeView(){const[reportTitle,setReportTitle]=useState([]);const[menuName,setMenuName]=useState([]);const[query,setQuery]=useState([]);const[allData,setAllData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{async function fetchMenuItems(){try{const response=await axios.get("/tree-view");const menuArray=[];const queryArray=[];const reportTitleArray=[];const allDataArray=menuArray+queryArray+reportTitleArray;let iteraty,menuAdi,raporBaslik,selectSorgusu;const tabloTanimlariDegerleri=Object.values(response.data);for(let i=0;i<tabloTanimlariDegerleri.length;i++){iteraty=response.data[i];menuAdi=Object.values(iteraty)[2];raporBaslik=Object.values(iteraty)[5];selectSorgusu=Object.values(iteraty)[6];menuArray.push(menuAdi);queryArray.push(selectSorgusu);reportTitleArray.push(raporBaslik);}setMenuName(menuArray);setQuery(queryArray);setReportTitle(reportTitleArray);setAllData(allDataArray);}catch(error){console.error("Failed to fetch menu items: ",error);}}fetchMenuItems();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 border rounded-lg shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"RAPORLAR"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:allData.map((queryItem,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"mb-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/report-page/".concat(index+1,"/").concat(queryItem[1]),className:"block px-4 py-2 w-40 bg-blue-500 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-blue-600",target:"_blank",children:allData[0]})},index))})]});}export default TreeView;
